text: The primary thing keeping me from switching to franklin is that I don't like any of the current templates very much, and I don't know enough to make my own (or migrate one from a different service). I've been using the Academic template for hugo, but that's getting _even more complicated_ than hugo itself... <https://wowchemy.com>
